summary: Stand alone version of Lightning Blaze Edge
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Stand-alone version of Lightning Blaze Edge, craftable at forge under daedric category & it\'s upgradeable at grindstone\'s.

Make sure you active .esp file in Skyrim Launcher >>> Data Files, i didnt test if activating works with NMM cuse i rather use launcher to activate mods.

p.s it\'s my first stand alone mod

~~~~~~~~~~
Install:
~~~~~~~~~~

Extract RAR file & put textures, meshes folders & .esp file inside your Skyrim/Data folder.

~~~~~~~~~~~
Unistall:
~~~~~~~~~~~

Delete files.

~~~~~~~~~
Credits:
~~~~~~~~~

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3457305]cptlee[/url] - For Re-textures
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=2354056]anjinewabe[/url] - For uploading original files
author: Snezko
